metadata.title: CVE-2015-3232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Field UI module in Drupal 7.x before7.38 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via a URL in the destinations parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.38-1').
